desc: 은색 빛을 발하는 높은 마력을 지닌 수정

dictionary.lore: From far away it appears silver, but upon closer look one can see a ray of light dancing inside this translucent crystal. It's said that the magic it holds turns into tiny reflective grains that make a sandy sound when shaken. Research on ways to use its magic is ongoing, but it is difficult to use and there are few successful attempts.

name: 마은의청안
